title: Dantas
body: The chapel of Nossa Senhora da Penha de França was founded by Antonio Dantas in 1622, and it is believed that the family surname Dantas, Antas, or Antes comes from Mem Afonso de Antas, originating from the place of Antes, the ancient municipality of Coura, in Minho.

Minho: Place of Antes, ancient municipality of Coura, in Minho

Antonio Dantas: Founder of the chapel of Nossa Senhora da Penha de França

1622: Foundation of the chapel of Nossa Senhora da Penha de França
